name: Something Is Wrong With My World Map
storyline:
On a random day, The Mother decides to send her daughter on a very important mission: to go buy some potatoes in the capital.
Her daughter Kalena, never having had the chance to explore the World Map, gladly accepts.

During her journey however she notices that something is off: why is she so big compared to everything else on the World Map? Her scale is all messed up!
Is it just a graphical effect, or is she really that huge?
summary:
"Something is wrong with my World Map" is a puzzle game, where you need to play with various sizes in the world map in order to create the right path to continue.

Switch size by exiting a village on a different side, or even by simply opening the map!

Step on a mountain to flatten it, or switch to the small size to enter caves!

Will you "step up" to the challenge?
